channel.title: Posts on Ron's Engineering Journal
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Ron's Engineering Journal

item.title: Week 1: In Retrospect
item.description:
Welcome to my blog. Here I aim to write biweekly chronicles of what I am up to.

This inaugural post will document the assembly of my robot and my all-too-brief vacation.

Over the last four months my peers and I traversed the proving ground known as robot summer. May to June was the practice round, 6 classes in half a semester, piece of cake for the masochists that populate the faculty, but July marked the start of the scorch trial.

item.title: Hello
item.description:
Welcome to my blog

This my fifteenth iteration of my first post.

Picture of me

Here I will test various Hugo and markdown features.

This is green, this is blue, this is purple

Hover over to see the secret message
